WorkshopItemInfo.Name: cs_assault (1.6)
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
The 1.6 version of cs_assault, ported to [i]Holdfast: Nations at War[/i]!
cs_assault was one of the first hostage rescue maps, first appearing in the 2000 beta and subsequently re-appearing in [i]1.6[/i], [i]Condition Zero[/i], [i]Source[/i], and [i]Global Offensive[/i]. Although it has been balanced in later games, it is still very T-sided - but remains a firm fan favourite.
Supports Army Battlefield, Army Assault, and Melee Arena. This map is best suited to smaller populations, the recommended configs available in this repository: https://github.com/AgentNo/holdfast-server-configs . Sappers will be unable to build on this map due to the lack of terrain.
This map also features working hostage objectives. To capture a hostage, play as CT and hold 'E' on the objective.
[url=https://www.models-resource.com/pc_computer/counterstrike16/model/28149/]cs_assault model courtesy of ViGamezBoy.[/url] Thanks to AGS Harper for the CSHO logo.
Part of the 87th's Counter-Strike: Holdfast Offensive collection. Join us today - https://discord.gg/dakvCACDSF
[h3]Latest Update - v. 1.1.15[/h3] - Updated mod icon
